docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN set -eux;     docker-php-ext-install -j "$(nproc)" opcache pdo_mysql mysqli

docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN {         echo 'opcache.memory_consumption=128';         echo 'opcache.interned_strings_buffer=8';         echo 'opcache.max_accelerated_files=4000';         echo 'opcache.revalidate_freq=60';         echo 'opcache.fast_shutdown=1';     } > /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/opcache-recommended.ini

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -eux;     curl -o yourls.tar.gz -fsSL "https://github.com/YOURLS/YOURLS/archive/${YOURLS_VERSION}.tar.gz";     echo "$YOURLS_SHA256 *yourls.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -; # upstream tarballs include ./YOURLS-${YOURLS_VERSION}/ so this gives us /usr/src/YOURLS-${YOURLS_VERSION}
docker.raw: RUN set -eux;     curl -o yourls.tar.gz -fsSL "https://github.com/YOURLS/YOURLS/archive/${YOURLS_VERSION}.tar.gz";     echo "$YOURLS_SHA256 *yourls.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -; # upstream tarballs include ./YOURLS-${YOURLS_VERSION}/ so this gives us /usr/src/YOURLS-${YOURLS_VERSION}

docker.name: TAR
docker.args: -xf yourls.tar.gz -C /usr/src/; # move back to a common /usr/src/yourls
docker.raw: tar -xf yourls.tar.gz -C /usr/src/; # move back to a common /usr/src/yourls
